participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and driven, Emily is focused on her goals and enjoys academic success. She is also sociable and enjoys participating in school events.
participant_1.background: my current goal is to run a k. i make straight as in school. i won homecoming queen this year. when i grow up i want to be a physical therapist. i am currently in high school.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Nostalgic and creative, Jessica has a playful spirit and enjoys expressing herself through dance and music.
participant_2.background: my favorite toy as a child was my lite brite. i love new kids on the block. i take dance lessons once a week. i also like old school hip hop. i was born in the early 80 s.
